name: 一面のお花畑 汐
flavor_text: わーい。こんなの、みたことない
ability: 【C】 Your other Character in the Center slot of the Front Row with 「渚」 or 「朋也」 in its name gets +1000 Power.

【S】 CONCENTRATION ［① REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, search your Deck for up to 1 Yellow Character and show it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle the Deck afterwards.

name: あの日の誓い 秋生
flavor_text:
すべてのものに感謝した。
そして、誓った。ずっとこいつのそばに居ようって
ability: 【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent's Level is 0 or lower, you may place that Character into Stock. If you did, place 1 card from the bottom of opponent's Stock into Waiting Room.
【A】 BOND／「元気な挨拶 渚」 ［Place 1 card from Hand into Waiting Room］(When this card is played onto Stage, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「元気な挨拶 渚」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand)

name: 共に歩む道程 渚
flavor_text:
いきましょう、朋也くん。
これが…今しかできない学校生活だと思います
ability: 【A】［① Place the top card of your Deck into Waiting Room, place this card into Memory］ When this card becomes REVERSE in battle, you may pay the Cost. If you did, search your Deck for up to 1 Character with Level 1 or lower and show it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle the Deck afterwards.

name: 共に歩む道程 渚だんご大家族 汐＆渚
flavor_text: 渚「町も人も、みんな家族です。だんご大家族です」
ability: 【C】 RECOLLECTION If 「共に歩む道程 渚」 is in your Memory, this card gets +3000 Power.

name: やりたい演劇 渚
flavor_text:
世界にたったひとり残された女の子のお話です。
それはとてもとても悲しい…冬の日の、幻想物語なんです
ability: 【C】 If you have other Characters with 「汐」 in its name, this card gets +1500 Power.

【A】 When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, if 「家族の絆」 is in your Climax slot, search your Deck for up to 1 Yellow Character and show it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle the Deck afterwards.

name: 元気な挨拶 渚
flavor_text: 岡崎さんっ。おはようございます
ability: 【C】 EXPERIENCE If 「元気な挨拶 渚」 and 「仲良し夫婦 渚＆朋也」 is in your Level slot, this card in your Hand gets -1 Level.
【C】 For each of your other Yellow Characters, this card gets +500 Power.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.

name: 仲の良い家族 渚＆早苗
flavor_text:
早苗「渚、わたしたちはピクニックにいきましょうね」
渚「本当ですかっ、とても楽しみです」
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your Deck, choose up to 1 card, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room. X is equals to the number of your Yellow Characters.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equals to the number of your Yellow Characters x500.

【A】［② Place 1 「だんご大家族 汐＆渚」 from Hand into Waiting Room］ This ability can only be activated up to 1 time each turn. When another of your Characters with Level 2 or lower attacks, if 「逞しい命」 is in the Climax slot, you may pay the Cost. If you did, STAND this card.

name: 逞しい命
flavor_text:
朋也「こいつが、これから歩んでいく道。それがどんな険しいもので…
そして、どんな長いものであっても…きっと、強く生きていく」
ability: 【C】 All your Characters gets +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Wind：When this card is Triggered, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Character, return it to Hand)

name: 家族の絆
flavor_text: 渚「ずっと傍に居ます。どんなときも、いつまでも、そばに居ます」
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Flame：When this card is Triggered, if your current attacking Character's damage is cancelled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: あたたかな奇跡 渚
ability: 【A】［② Place 1 of your Character from Stage into Waiting Room］ When you use this card's 『ASSIST』, you may pay the Cost. If you did, choose 1 of your opponent's Character with Level higher than your opponent's Level, place it into Waiting Room.
【S】● ASSIST 1500 Level 1 ［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets +1500 Power)
